summary: Rush Hour is an American movie made in 1998 by Warner Bros.
full_text: Christopher "Chris" Tucker  is an American actor and stand-up comedian. He is known for playing the role of Smokey in Friday and as Detective James Carter in the Rush Hour film series. Tucker became a frequent stand up performer on Def Comedy Jam in the 1990s. He also appeared in Luc Besson's The Fifth Element.
title: Chris Tucker
